channel.title: Sections on Dr. Himani Arora
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on Dr. Himani Arora

item.description: Welcome to my website! I am a postdoctoral researcher at the Helmholtz-Zentrum Dresden-Rossendorf HZDR. I received my Ph.D. in Physics from TU Dresden in 2020. My research is about ultra-thin semiconductors and their electronic applications. Advanced Materials Back Cover
Email: himani.arora.06@gmail.com Github: himani-arora-ha ORCID: Visit my profile here Google Scholar: Visit my profile here
My research was covered in Optics & Photonics News! Informationsdienst Wissenschaft covered my PhD project here
Follow the amazing Peace Slam project, where I am a proud member!
